function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 among construction stakeholders","Impact":"Health risks leading to illness, absenteeism, and potential fatalities","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, providing PPE, and enforcing social distancing measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature monitoring systems, and ventilation improvements","People":"Construction managers, workers, subcontractors, project administration team","Owner":"Construction companies, project administration team"}]}
